website_summaries.verdict: A small, light, and durable device for those who need backup on the go.
pros: Fits in the palm of an average male hand
No reformatting needed to work on a Mac
Storage space for the detachable cable helps prevent you from losing it
cons: No backup program, so you’ll need to drag and drop your files one by one

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it came the next day--without user instructions or warranty card. Amazon graciously gave me a full refund on the return. So I ordered a second one which came the next day--again without user instructions or warranty card. I returned this one also and got a full refund...and ordered a completely different hard drive. So I cannot comment on how well this item works as I did nothing more than take it out of the box, put it back in the box, and returned it. This lack of user manual and warranty card has been mentioned by several reviewers, so it evidently is a quality control problem with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: AZ golfer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do, one drawback
customer_reviews.text: Works with any computer I've hooked it up to, Chromebook, Dell, Mac, etc., without any issues. Dosen't heat up too much, very fast data transfer, and it is indeed impact and water resistant (accidents have tested both features). Its also pretty light, which I prefer, some of these drives can get very heavy and are annoying to carry. My only con is that the little clips that are suppose to hold the USB cable along the outside popped off and got lost wothin a few days of using them, and didn't hold onto the cable well to begin with. I will probably buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: FireIron

customer_reviews.title: Works for a few minutes before self-ejects
customer_reviews.text: That’s an expensive piece of garbage! It connects to my computer for 3-5 minutes and then closes itself. I ordered this based on good reviews, so maybe it’s an outlier, but unfortunately I live overseas so I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: danm

customer_reviews.title: Backup & Restore NOT A PLUG & PLAY
customer_reviews.text: This is not a plug & play HD. for backup & restore, it is terrible. Instructions are poor ,, called support 10 times an line is busy. When you do get someone they are hard to understand due to accent. No light so you never know if its on. I had 3 other brand backups and this is the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie  R

customer_reviews.title: only getting 15-20MB/sec transer
customer_reviews.text: Super slow, this morning my computer was froze which doesn't happen on other external drives. Trying to make a second back up of music files. I'm only getting 15-20MB/sec transer, usually I see 80 over usb 3.0. I've adjusted the policies to optimize the properties but no performance changes. I'm at my end with this
customer_reviews.author: Krissie kohler

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use on his Xbox, works great for now. Easy to install and looks very durable from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.... Absolutely no issues
customer_reviews.text: This external drive was purchased as extra storage for an Xbox one for a tween. I plugged it in and followed the onscreen prompts. It was immediately recognized by the Xbox and prompted me to format. After formatting, it prompted me to select where I wanted new game saving to occur and I chose this external drive. That was it. My son tells me that he's had no issues with it at all. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mamma3

customer_reviews.title: Nice drive
customer_reviews.text: This external drive came quickly and came with a USB-c cable, which was a must. It was easy to connect and use. It was a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Least Expensive and Prettiest Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up to my imac and spent three hours loading 850 MB of movies on to it. Then I tested it by playing back some of the movies with no problems. Then I hooked it up to my Micca Speck G2 Media Player and tested playing movies on my TV. It worked perfectly. I've had no problems with my two other Silicon Power hard drives. One has been working great for five years and the other one for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for its plug and play as I'm not very tech savvy. It was not that easy and did not work. After 90 minutes with tech support, I'm getting a replacement. That is another important lesson - don't wait too long to open your packages - 30 day limit on a refund. I'll hope the replacement works better. It is very cute, lightweight and easy for my bag. I also like the attached cable. Hopefully, the next will work because that is what counts the most.
customer_reviews.author: bjb

customer_reviews.title: Durable External Hard drive
customer_reviews.text: After dropping my last external, I needed a new one that was drop proof. While I haven’t tested that theory yet and don’t plan to, this one FEELS much more sturdy and military-grade, as it claims. I had a bit of difficulty setting it up with my Mac initially, but after some troubleshooting, I got it working and it has been doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Does it work with a Mac . NO
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save files on this for my Mac it will run as a system backup but thats it . U can't save single files . Or I can't figure it out .
customer_reviews.author: No Deal

customer_reviews.title: Second One
customer_reviews.text: I loved my 2TB one so much that I use for work and school that I bought my partner one for his PS4. It's perfect and we like both of them. Both were on sale when I ordered them and their value was great. If I ever need another or my parents ask about one I'd go with this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Very Rugged
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement drive for an older SP Armor model, which I pretty much have worn out. Mainly the USB cable, not the hard -drive. This is an excellent product. I use three different computers, so I store all my files on an external drive and this is ideal when you switch computers.
customer_reviews.author: W. Anemaat

customer_reviews.title: Great Harddrive
customer_reviews.text: Great external hard drive for play station. Easy to install and hook up. No issues at all and works like a charm. Able to download many more games!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to format it..
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my ps4 I already have a gig but I always need more, after I formatted it, it works great and a hint your ps4 will ask you to format it you have to so be scared to buy it it works great.....
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Drive is not reliable and is very slow
customer_reviews.text: Drive randomly disconnects. Connection with the USB cable is not a firm connection. Drive speeds are not good. Do not purchase this drive.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and perfect for my ps4. I'm so glad I have more room now for more games without having to delete all of my other games. So far it hasn't given me any problems so hopefully it stays that way
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many portable hard drives over the years, but the SP Armor A60 is the best yet. Simple to set up and built to be very durable; even waterproof. I will be looking to SP first in the future for my memory needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Used for xbox one
customer_reviews.text: Previously bought the seagate brand, that one failed in three weeks. This one is a much better quality and has not given any problems yet
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE HELP
customer_reviews.text: STOPPED WORKING CANT FORMAT AND PUT INFO IN IT PLEASE HELP ! I BACKED UP ALL MY INFO NOW IT DOESNT EVEN GO INTO MY MAC
customer_reviews.author: Aaa

customer_reviews.title: My kid is no longer asking for a new xbox.
customer_reviews.text: My kid is no longer asking for a new xbox. My kid wanted a new xBox1 because he kept having delete games in order to get new ones. Plugged this in and no longer have that issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: constantly shut down and disconnects
customer_reviews.text: i love the durable shell and the ease of connecting to my MacBook, but after a few weeks it kept disconnecting during editing, i can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: ti

customer_reviews.title: USB 3 speed.  Streams video to my laptop very well
customer_reviews.text: Cable could have better clips. They just nestle in grooves in the perimeter and constantly fall off. PLUS each end is a USB A plug which is impossible to find. 6in cable is very limiting.
customer_reviews.author: Ready Nerd

customer_reviews.title: VERY FRUSTRATING! No instructions, NO PLUG & PLAY as promised....
customer_reviews.text: My computer couldn't even find it after I plugged it in for 24 hrs. to perhaps, charge it? No go. I'm still trying to get help with it. There are NO buttons, on/off switches, NOTHING! Just a little black box and a short USB cable. I would not CONSIDER even buying it had I known, info and support are, (so far), impossible to find.
customer_reviews.author: M. Diekmann

customer_reviews.title: SSD and very portable..
customer_reviews.text: The USB transfer seems kind slow, compared to my old FireWire drive, but the storage is large enough to back yup my files. I wish there was a better way to store the USB cable, mutt clips on to the body of the drive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his Xbox and it works great! Easy for him to carry it when he takes his xbox somewhere. Hooks up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia B

customer_reviews.title: My back up "died" after 7 months, I lost all of file my files
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the second time, the 1T version did not sync; and lost all of the files for my clients -- quite a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Took seconds to format for my Xbox one and game transfer is fast and smooth, direct download is great too. Will buy another one soon but will go for more space, probably a 2T. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: 1TB external drive
customer_reviews.text: This drive is nicely made. 1TB does not equal 931GB. But at this price with the features this drive came with I'm willing to overlook the size discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos & Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Product works perfectly as described. This is exactly what I needed and at an affordable price! Love the color options as well.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: I'm using it as a back up for my desktop
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small 1TB drive for my backup files and this does the job perfectly. It is just plug and play. My Windows 10 links to it with no hassle and it has the capacity to hold many backups.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with my PS4. Plug and play setup. Update: it's now November 25th 2019 and this product is still going strong a year later.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for PS4
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I did have to use my computer to format it to Efax so I could use it on my PS4 but it worked perfectly and thankfully that's easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Necro Neko

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Option
customer_reviews.text: I love this hard drive. It backs up my google drive but for me it transfers data slowly since it a USB connection. There are faster ways like USB-C or something. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: T. Evon Jones

customer_reviews.title: PS4 storage extender
customer_reviews.text: This works as a PS4 storage extender for me, I now have 2TB of storage. Its plug and play but first you will need to format the drive as it instructs you which is pretty quick format, but if it says you can't format it just simply unplug it and plug back into the 2nd USB port an you'll be able to format from there and download more games.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great...so far
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and capacity of the drive but only time will tell of the durability. I had a bad experience with my previous drive (different product). Haven’t had to use tech support yet.
customer_reviews.author: Zenikki

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use, installation and durability is amazing with this product. Price was the best on this and the reviews were good. I bought two of these a few months ago and they work amazingly. One for each of my kids ps4. They are both hugely into gaming and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and use, especially for those of us who are computer illiterate. I was also impressed by the next day shipping. Arrived quickly and installed quickly. I'm impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Error when plugged in
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this into my device and it has an immediate error. I am unable to use this external drive for anything.... waste of money. I would recommend you to not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah L Perry

customer_reviews.title: Next Day Delivery! I ordered it Saturday!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The installation was easy as plugging it in to my Xbox One. Since it's for games, I had to reformat it but it was easy. 1 Click and the reformat was complete. Within 5 minutes, 7 games were synced and good to go. Great product, Easy Install, Fast Sync, and Next Day Delivery. Perfect order!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Super easy plug and play setup, perfect for my son who need it for his PS4. He's happy, I'm happy, all is right in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Eeriemyst

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good Filling it up Long term reliability will have to be seen
customer_reviews.author: Robert Higgins

customer_reviews.title: sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. I have already dropped it several times and no dents or scratches. I purchased this product because it had a way to store the usb cable when it was not in use so I don't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clay

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Stores a lot of data
customer_reviews.text: Great! Works well using it with Xbox one for game storage!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna h

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Install
customer_reviews.text: Just plugged it into my Xbox, followed the prompt on the screen, installed. Very easy to use. Would recommend to others, and would buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: DSKO1

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Format and works just fine with the ps4. No issues yet ! great pick up
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, yet sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Sleek style makes it portable, yet sturdy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good college backup
customer_reviews.text: Useing this for college, in a video production major. Works great for Mac or PC. Very sturdy and has an led light thats easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Ed Harper

customer_reviews.title: I feel I spent my money wisely.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, speed and ease of use. And it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: CDS

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play, worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a short time, but the case seems fairly protective. I don't have any plans to drop it in a lake or off a tall building, but it looks and feels like it would survive a drop off a table. I LOVE that it takes a standard USB cable, and that a short one is included and clips into the enclosure so you're sure to have it when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: craignelson7007

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the software, I use this drive to back up my laptop drive. Has a decent transfer speed and feels rugged enough to withstand carrying around in my laptop bag.

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is what we stored on there we can't get back out, and tech support was no help at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bina68

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It holds all the information I need it too and I haven't had any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than a year of light use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke less than year after light use. No longer loads on my computer, it won't even pick it up anymore but i have other external drives that read just fine. Had all my projects on it and expected it to last longer than year.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Awsome product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a backup for my playstation, very compact, one of my best purchase

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play for XBONE
customer_reviews.text: Just connect it, let XBONE format it, and now have room for all games.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great but did have to get a new cord because the one that came with it did not always register with my xbox. I'd be in the middle of a game and my external hard drive would act as if someone unplugged it from my Xbox and plugged it back and it'd shut my game off and send me to Xbox home page.
customer_reviews.author: L.Harris

customer_reviews.title: Durable Storage for Movies and files on the go
customer_reviews.text: System works with Linux based Operating systems, Tablets, Cellphones and laptops. If you put a lot of files on the drive, give it a moment to populate the display you looking at. 1TB is a lot of real-estate to go thru.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works on a Raspberry  Pi
customer_reviews.text: This hdd is being used to serve movies from my Raspberry Pi 4 to my home network. Bought what I could afford, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Well I mean it’s a hard drive...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this all 4 stars only because it does exactly what I need it too no matter the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell B.

customer_reviews.title: Formatting error in description
customer_reviews.text: The product description stated it's compatible with Xbox 360 and other consoles. That isn't true. It comes in the NTPS format and only allow to be changed to Exfat. Google a website and it can help you format it to the FAT32 that Xbox requires. But overall great product now that I have it up and going.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had to reformat the drive to the exfat to use it with my IPad Pro and works like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable HD. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great portable HD. I use it to back up my security system.

customer_reviews.title: Fatal error
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this item when I first got it but only after 4 months it has come up with a fatal error.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is spot on
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome I use it for my Xbox one when you plug it up you get to name it witch is one of the best things about it and the color it shows in the picture is spot on and it feels really good quality

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd purchase

customer_reviews.text: Product NOT compatible with my PS4, contrary to the products description.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Affordable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as additional storage for my PS4 and it works great! It was plug and play no hassle to set up. It was reasonably quick to back up a couple hundred gigs of data. Well worth the price. It had an appealing look and sturdy exterior.

customer_reviews.title: Great external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: This external hard drive checked all the boxes for me

customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with directions.. but once we got it set up correctly it was awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable storage device.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last Christmas for my son to use with his Xbox One. Easy to use extra storage for all his video games.

customer_reviews.title: I bought a shock-resistant hard drive, and it really is as resistant as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.text: It's USB 3.0 compatible and comes with a compliant cable to plug it into your system. Said cable's not very long, but is held wrapped around the drive's case by a simple mechanism of two plastic 'pacman-like' artifacts in the case's borders, which makes it easy not to lose track of.

customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much. Minus the crisis that we are currently in as a country, my order was recieved in a timely fashion with no issues and I love it. Thank you again. Stay safe!!

product_meta.title: Silicon Power 1TB Black Rugged Portable External Hard Drive Armor A60, Shockproof USB 3.0 for PC, Mac, Xbox and PS4 - New Version
product_meta.description: Capacity:1TB| Color:Black-GreenNo More Deleting Your Favorite Games The Armor A60 allows you to easily free up the storage of your console's internal drive for Xbox and PS4. Just plug the A60 directly into your USB port on your Xbox or PlayStation 4 console and run through an easy setup process within just a few minutes, and you will have more space to store your latest games. Military-grade Shockproof & Water-resistant Armor A60 incorporates ultra-rugged rubber casing and internal suspension system, which enable perfect buffer effect and assure rigid protections against crushes, dust and spraying water. Cable-carry Design The innovative slot design is equipped for simple cable carrying and storing. Anti-slip, Anti-scratch Armor A60 exercises the special surface texture that can not only allow anti-slip function but also keep the drive from damages caused by fingerprints and scratches. Ultra-fast Transfer Speed SuperSpeed USB 3.0 interface enables blazing-fast speed performance to quickly transfer large files including HD videos, high-resolution photos and great numbers of documents in seconds. 3-year Warranty The Armor A60 is backed by a 3-year warranty that guarantees complete services and technical support. Box Contains 1 x Silicon Power Armor A60 External Hard Drive 1 x USB 3.0 Cable
